name: ARMOR
0:
”Alexa, ask My Armor to turn on WiFi light”
”Alexa, ask My Armor to test Internet speed”
”Alexa, ask My Armor to turn off guest WiFi”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my armor
des:
Zyxel and Alexa allows you to use your voice to control your Armor's WiFi. All you need is to have a registered account with Armor and link it up with Alexa. Here are some voice commands you can use with Armor and Alexa:

 1. Alexa, ask My Armor to turn off guest WiFi
 2. Alexa, ask My Armor to test Internet speed
 3. Alexa, ask My Armor to turn on WiFi light
 4. Alexa, ask My Armor to turn off WiFi light
 5. Alexa, ask My Armor to pause the Internet

To enable Amazon Alexa with Zyxel Armor:
1. Download the Armor app.
2. Open the Armor app and register a myZyxelCloud account
3. Login Armor app.
4. Complete the setup.
5. Link myZyxelCloud account with Alexa.

Before you can start using Armor with Alexa, please use the Alexa APP to link your Amazon account with your myZyxelCloud account.

Support models: Armor G1, Armor G5
